feed.title: Lac La Biche - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lac La Biche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
